rukus.text: Abange mmwe abakkiriza bwe muba mugenda okusaala muteekeddwa okunaaza ebyenyi byammwe, n’emikono gyammwe okutuusa mu nkokola, era musiige ku mitwe gyammwe, munaaze n’ebigere byammwe okutuuka ku bukongovule, bwe muba nga mulina Janaba muteekeddwa okunaaba naye bwe mubanga abalwadde, oba nga muli ku safari, oba omu ku mmwe nga avudde mukumala ekyetaago ekyobutonde, oba nemukwata ku bakyala (mumbera ezo zonna) nemutafuna mazzi, kale nno, mutayammame, nga mukozesa ettaka eddungi, (ekyo mukikola) nga musiiga ku byenyi byammwe n’emikono gyammwe, Katonda tayagalangako kubateerawo bukalubo bwonna, naye ayagala kubatukuza era abajjulize ekyengerakye musobole okubeera nga mwebaza
Era mujjukire e kyengera kya Katonda kyeyabawa n'endagaanoye gyeyabakozesa bwemwagamba nti tuwulidde era tugonze. Era mutye Katonda, anti mazima Katonda amanyidde ddala ebyo ebiri mu bifuba

Abange mmwe abakkiriza mubeere beesimbu ku lwa Katonda, nga muwa obujulizi mubwenkanya, abantu okuba abalabe ba mmwe, tekibawugulanga nemutakola mazima, bulijjo mukole obwenkanya, kyo kyekiri okumpi n'okutya Katonda, era mutye Katonda, mazima Katonda amanyidde ddala byemukola
Katonda yalagaanyisa abo abakkiriza nebakola emirimu emirungi, nti balina ekisonyiwo nempeera ensukkulumu
Ate abo ab'akaafuwala nebalimbisa ebigambo byaffe, abo nno be bantu b’omumuliro

Abange mmwe abakkiriza mujjukire ekyengera kya Katonda kye yabawa, abantu abamu bwe baayagala okugolola e mikono gyaabwe (babalwanyise), n'aziyiza e mikono gyaabwe ku mmwe, era bulijjo mutye Katonda, Katonda yekka abakkiriza gwebateekeddwa okwesiga
